c_ability.name: Leer
c_ability.description: Leer Leer EQUIP an ethereal, destructible eye. ACTIVATE to cast the eye a short distance forward. The eye will Nearsight all enemies who look at it.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 250 Windup 0.4 s Duration 1.6 s Health 100 HP

q_ability.name: Devour
q_ability.description: Devour Devour INSTANTLY consume a nearby soul orb, rapidly Healing. If Empress Empress is active, this skill will automatically cast and not consume the Soul Orb.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 200 (shared with Dismiss) Duration 2 s Healing 50 HP Buff Permanent Overheal

e_ability.name: Dismiss
e_ability.description: Dismiss Dismiss INSTANTLY consume a nearby Soul Orb, becoming Intangible for a short duration. If Empress Empress is active, also become Invisible.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 200 (shared with Devour) Duration 1.5 s

x_ability.name: Empress
x_ability.description: Empress Empress INSTANTLY enter a frenzy, gaining a Combat Stim that increases firing, equip and reload speed dramatically. Gain infinite charges of Soul Harvest abilities.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦ 6 points Buff +25% Equip speed, +15% Fire rate, +25% Reload speed, +25% Recovery speed

c_ability.name: Regrowth
c_ability.description: EQUIP a healing trinket. HOLD FIRE to channel, Healing allies in range and line of sight. Can be reused until her healing pool is depleted. Skye cannot heal herself.

q_ability.name: Trailblazer
q_ability.description: EQUIP a Tasmanian tiger trinket. FIRE to send out and take control of the predator. While in control, FIRE to leap forward, exploding in a Concussive blast and damaging directly hit enemies.

e_ability.name: Guiding Light
e_ability.description: EQUIP a hawk trinket. FIRE to send it forward. HOLD FIRE to guide the hawk in the direction of your crosshair. RE-USE while the hawk is in flight to transform it into a flash. The flash reaches max potency after a short duration during the hawk's flight.

x_ability.name: Seekers
x_ability.description: EQUIP a Seeker trinket. FIRE to send out three Seekers to track down the three closest enemies. If a Seeker reaches its target, it Nearsights them. Enemies can destroy the Seekers.

c_ability.name: Fakeout
c_ability.description: EQUIP an echo that transforms into a mirror image of Yoru when activated. FIRE to instantly activate the mirror image and send it forward. ALT FIRE to place an inactive echo. USE to transform an inactive echo into a mirror image and send it forward. Mirror images explode in a Blinding Flash when destroyed by enemies.

q_ability.name: Blindside
q_ability.description: EQUIP to rip an unstable dimensional fragment from reality. FIRE to throw the fragment, activating a flash that winds up once it collides with a hard surface.

e_ability.name: Gatecrash
e_ability.description: EQUIP a rift tether. FIRE to send the tether forward. ALT FIRE to place a stationary tether. ACTIVATE to teleport to the tether's location. USE to trigger a fake teleport.

x_ability.name: Dimensional Drift
x_ability.description: EQUIP a mask that can see between dimensions. FIRE to drift into Yoru's dimension, unable to be affected or seen by enemies from the outside. REACTIVATE to exit Yoru's dimension early.

c_ability.name: Gravity Well
c_ability.description: ACTIVATE a Stars Star to form a Gravity Well. Players in the area are pulled toward the center before it explodes, making all players still trapped inside Vulnerable. C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Windup 1.25 s Duration 2 s Cooldown 45 s Debuff 5 s Vulnerable

q_ability.name: Nova Pulse
q_ability.description: ACTIVATE a Stars Star to detonate a Nova Pulse. The Nova Pulse charges briefly then strikes, Concussing all players in its area. Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Windup 1 s Cooldown 45 s Debuff 4 s Concuss

e_ability.name: Nebula / Dissipate
e_ability.description: Nebula - Dissipate ACTIVATE a Stars Star to transform it into a Nebula (smoke). USE a Star to Dissipate it, returning the Star to be placed in a new location after a delay. Dissipate briefly forms a fake Nebula at the Star's location before returning. E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Duration 14.25 s (Nebula)/1 s (Dissipate) Cooldown 25 s (Nebula)

x_ability.name: Cosmic Divide
x_ability.description: When Cosmic Divide is charged, use ALT FIRE in Astral Form to begin aiming it, then FIRE to select two locations. An infinite Cosmic Divide connects the two points you select. Cosmic Divide blocks bullets and sound. X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 7 points Duration 21 s (effective total duration)

c_ability.name: FRAG/ment
c_ability.description: FRAG/ment FRAG-ment EQUIP an explosive fragment. FIRE to throw. ALT FIRE to lob. The fragment sticks to the floor and explodes multiple times, dealing near lethal damage at the center with each explosion.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 200 Duration 4 s Damage 25-60 per tick (Min. outer radius-Inner radius), 1 tick/sec

q_ability.name: FLASH/drive
q_ability.description: FLASH-drive EQUIP a flash grenade. FIRE to overhand throw. ALT FIRE to lob a weaker version that explodes quickly. The flash grenade explodes after a short fuse, Blinding anyone in line of sight.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 250 Windup 1.6 s (Primary), 1 s (Alt) Debuff 2.25 s (Primary), 1.25 s (Alt)

e_ability.name: ZERO/point
e_ability.description: Signature ZERO-point EQUIP a suppression blade. FIRE to throw. The blade sticks to the first surface it hits, winds up, and Suppresses anyone in the radius of the explosion. Enemies can destroy this blade.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Free Windup 1 s Cooldown 40 s Health 20 HP Debuff 8 s Suppression

x_ability.name: NULL/cmd
x_ability.description: Ultimate NULL-cmd INSTANTLY Overload with polarized radianite energy that pulses from KAY/O in a massive radius. Enemies hit with pulses are Suppressed for a short duration. While overloaded, KAY/O gains Combat Stim and can be re-stabilized if downed.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 8 points Windup Stabilization: 3 s, Revive: 1.55 s Duration Overload: 12 s, Downed: 15 s Health 850 HP (Downed) Buff +15% Fire rate, +10% Reload speed, +10% Recovery speed Debuff 4 s Suppression

c_ability.name: Trademark
c_ability.description: EQUIP a trap that scans for enemies. FIRE to place it on the ground. When a visible enemy comes in range, the trap counts down and then destabilizes the terrain around them, creating a lingering field that Slows players caught inside of it. The trap can be picked up to be REDEPLOYED.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 200 Windup 2 s Cooldown 30 s (Recalled) Health 20 HP Debuff 4 s 50% Slow

q_ability.name: Headhunter
q_ability.description: ACTIVATE to equip a heavy pistol. ALT FIRE with the pistol equipped to aim down sights.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Ammo 8 bullets max. Credits icon 100 per bullet Damage 159 Head, 55 Body, 46 Legs

e_ability.name: Rendezvous
e_ability.description: EQUIP a teleport anchor. FIRE to place it on the ground. While on the ground and in range of the anchor, REACTIVATE to quickly teleport to the anchor. The anchor can be picked up to be REDEPLOYED.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Free Duration 1.3 s Cooldown 30 s (Used/Recalled) Health 50 HP

x_ability.name: Tour De Force
x_ability.description: ACTIVATE to summon a powerful, custom sniper rifle that will kill an enemy with any direct hit to the upper body. ALT FIRE to aim down sights. Killing an enemy creates a lingering field that Slows players caught inside of it.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 8 Ammo 5 Windup 2.3 s Damage 255 Head, 150 Body, 127 Legs Debuff 4 s 50% Slow

c_ability.name: Fast Lane
c_ability.description: FIRE two energy lines forward on the ground that extend a short distance or until they hit a surface. The lines rise into walls of static electricity that block vision.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 300 Duration 4 s

q_ability.name: Relay Bolt
q_ability.description: INSTANTLY throw an energy bolt that bounces once. Upon hitting each surface, the bolt electrifies the ground below with a Concussive blast.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 200 Windup 0.8 s Debuff 3.5 s Concuss

e_ability.name: High Gear
e_ability.description: INSTANTLY channel Neon's power for Increased Speed. When charged, ALT FIRE to trigger an electric slide. Slide charge resets every two kills.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 150 Duration 10 s max. Cooldown 2 kill recharge

x_ability.name: Overdrive
x_ability.description: Unleash Neon's full power and speed for a short duration. FIRE to channel the power into a deadly lightning beam with high movement accuracy.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 7 Duration 20 s min. Damage 54-30 Head, 18-10 Body, 15-8 Legs (with falloff)

c_ability.name: Prowler
c_ability.description: EQUIP a prowler. FIRE to send the prowler forward. HOLD FIRE to steer the prowler towards your crosshair. The prowler will chase down the first enemy or terror trail it sees, and nearsight the enemy on impact.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 250 Duration 2.5 s Health 60 HP Debuff 2.75 s Nearsight

q_ability.name: Seize
q_ability.description: EQUIP a knot of raw fear. FIRE to throw. The knot drops down after a set time. RE-USE to drop the knot early. The knot ruptures on impact, holding nearby enemies in place. Held enemies are Deafened, and Decayed.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 200 Duration 4.5 s Debuff Deafen, Tether, 75 HP Decay (restored over 5 s)

e_ability.name: Haunt
e_ability.description: EQUIP a haunting watcher. FIRE to throw. The watcher drops down after a set time. RE-USE to drop the watcher early. The watcher lashes out on impact, Revealing enemies in its line of sight and creating terror trails to them. Enemies can destroy the watcher.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Free Duration 2 s Cooldown 40 s Health 1 HP Debuff Real-time Reveal, 12 s Trail

x_ability.name: Nightfall
x_ability.description: EQUIP the power of nightmare itself. FIRE to unleash a wave of unstoppable nightmare energy. Enemies caught in the wave are Marked by terror trails, Deafened, and Decayed.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 8 Debuff 12 s Trail + Deafen, 75 HP Decay (restored over 12 s)

c_ability.name: Cascade
c_ability.description: EQUIP a wave of water. FIRE to send the wave rolling forward and through walls. RE-USE to stop the wave. Players hit are Slowed.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 150 Duration 7 s (whilst stationary) Debuff 30% Slow

q_ability.name: Cove
q_ability.description: EQUIP a sphere of shielding water. FIRE to throw. ALT FIRE to lob. Upon impacting the ground, spawn a destructible water shield that blocks bullets.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 350 Windup 0.8 s Duration 15 s Health 500 HP

e_ability.name: High Tide
e_ability.description: EQUIP a wall of water. FIRE to send the water forward along the ground. HOLD FIRE to guide the water in the direction of your crosshair, passing through the world, spawning a wall along the water's path. ALT FIRE while bending to stop the water early. Players hit are Slowed.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Free Windup 2 s Duration 15 s Cooldown 40 s Debuff 30% Slow

x_ability.name: Reckoning
x_ability.description: EQUIP the full power of your Artifact. FIRE to summon a geyser pool on the ground. Enemy players in the area are targeted by successive geyser strikes. Players caught within a strike are Concussed.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S)

c_ability.name: Mosh Pit
c_ability.description: EQUIP Mosh. FIRE to throw Mosh like a grenade. ALT FIRE to lob. Upon landing Mosh duplicates across a large area that deals a small amount of damage over time then after a short delay explodes.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 250 Windup 3 s Damage 10/sec during windup, then 25/50 per tick (Outer/Inner radius), 3 ticks within 0.2 s

q_ability.name: Wingman
q_ability.description: EQUIP Wingman. FIRE to send Wingman forward seeking enemies. Wingman unleashes a Concussive blast toward the first enemy he sees. ALT FIRE when targeting a Spike site or planted Spike to have Wingman defuse or plant the Spike. To plant, Gekko must have the Spike in his inventory.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 300 Duration 5 s (without spike) Cooldown 10 s (granted by Globules) Health 80 HP Debuff 2.5 s Concuss

e_ability.name: Signature Dizzy
e_ability.description: EQUIP Dizzy. FIRE to send Dizzy soaring forward through the air. Dizzy charges then unleashes plasma blasts at enemies in line of sight. Enemies hit by her plasma are Blinded.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Free Windup 0.35 s Duration 2.5 s Cooldown 10 s (granted by Globules) Health 20 HP Debuff 1 s Blind (max potency)

x_ability.name: Ultimate Thrash
x_ability.description: EQUIP Thrash. FIRE to link with Thrash's mind and steer her through enemy territory. ACTIVATE to lunge forward and explode, Detaining any players in a small radius.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 8 points Windup 0.6 s Duration 6 s Cooldown 10 s (granted by Globules) Health 200 HP Debuff 6 s

c_ability.name: GravNet
c_ability.description: GravNet EQUIP a GravNet grenade. FIRE to throw. ALT FIRE to lob. The GravNet detonates upon landing, forcing any characters caught within to crouch and move slowly.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 200 Windup 0.4 s Debuff Forced crouch, 70% slow

q_ability.name: Sonic Sensor
q_ability.description: Sonic Sensor EQUIP a Sonic Sensor. FIRE to deploy. The sensor monitors an area for enemies making sound. It concusses that area if footsteps, weapons fire, or significant noise are detected.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 200 Health 20 HP Debuff 3.5 s Concuss

e_ability.name: Barrier Mesh
e_ability.description: Barrier Mesh EQUIP a Barrier Mesh disc. FIRE to throw forward. Upon landing, the disc generates barriers from the origin point that block character movement.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Free Windup 3 s for fortification Duration 30 s Health 320/680 HP, 570/1,200 HP when fortified (Outer orbs/Central orb)

x_ability.name: Annihilation
x_ability.description: Annihilation EQUIP a Nanowire Accelerator. FIRE to unleash a pulse of nanowires that captures the first enemy contacted. The cocooned enemy is pulled along a nanowire path and will die if they reach the end, unless they are freed. The nanowire cocoon is destructible.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 7 points Windup 1.1 s Duration 10 s Health 600 HP Debuff 7 s

c_ability.name: Contingency
c_ability.description: Contingency EQUIP to assemble prismatic energy. FIRE to push an indestructible wall of energy forward that blocks bullets.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 200 Duration 4.6 s (minimum at full size)

q_ability.name: Undercut
q_ability.description: Undercut EQUIP a molecular bolt. Fire to throw it forward, briefly applying Vulnerable to all players it touches. The bolt can pass through solid objects, including walls.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 200 Debuff 4 s Vulnerable

e_ability.name: Double Tap
e_ability.description: Double Tap INSTANTLY start channeling your focus. Once focused: gain a shield which absorbs one instance of damage from any source, and enter a flow state during which downed enemies you kill or damage spawn an energy orb. Shooting this orb refreshes your flow state and your existing shield, or grants another.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Free Windup 1 s Duration 12 s Buff +25% Reload speed

x_ability.name: Kill Contract
x_ability.description: Kill Contract EQUIP an interdimensional arena. FIRE to hurl a column of energy through the battlefield, pulling you and the first enemy hit into the arena. You and your opponent duel to the death.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 7 Windup 2.9 s Duration 13

c_ability.name: Pick-me-up
c_ability.description: ACTIVATE to absorb the life force of a fallen enemy that Clove damaged or killed, gaining haste and temporary health.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 200 Windup 0.7 s Duration 8 s Buff +15% speed boost, 100 Overheal HP max

q_ability.name: Meddle
q_ability.description: EQUIP a fragment of immortality essence. FIRE to throw the fragment, which erupts after a short delay and temporarily Decays all targets caught inside.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 250 Windup 1.3 s Duration 5 s Debuff 90 HP max Decay

e_ability.name: Signature Ruse
e_ability.description: EQUIP a view of the battlefield. FIRE to set the locations where Clove’s clouds will settle. ALT FIRE to confirm, launching clouds that block vision in the chosen areas. Clove can use this ability after death.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 150 Windup 1 s Duration 13.5 s Cooldown 30 s

x_ability.name: Ultimate Not Dead Yet
x_ability.description: After dying, ACTIVATE to resurrect. Once resurrected, Clove must earn a kill or a damaging assist within a set time or they will die. REACTIVATE to cancel early.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 8 points Windup 1.5 s (Revive), 0.8 s (Intangibility deactivation) Duration 12 s Buff 2 s max Int

c_ability.name: Razorvine
c_ability.description: Razorvine EQUIP a nest of liquid metal. FIRE to launch. Upon landing, the nest becomes invisible. When ACTIVATED, it sprawls out into a large razorvine nest which slows and damages all players who move through it.  C(PC) • L1(PS5) • Xbox LB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 2 Credits icon 150 Windup 0.3 s Duration 10 s Health 40 HP Damage 6 per 1.25 meters traveled Debuff 15% Slow

q_ability.name: Shear
q_ability.description: Shear EQUIP filaments of liquid metal. FIRE to place a hidden wall trap. When an enemy crosses, an indestructible wall bursts from the ground behind them. The wall lasts for a brief time before dissipating.  Q(PC) • R1(PS5) • Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Credits icon 200 Windup 0.8 s Duration 7.8 s

e_ability.name: Signature Arc Rose
e_ability.description: Signature Arc Rose EQUIP an Arc Rose. Target a surface and FIRE to place a stealthed Arc Rose, or ALT FIRE to place the Arc Rose through it. REUSE to blind all players looking at it. This ability can be picked up to be REDEPLOYED.  E(PC) • ◯(PS5) • Xbox B button (Xbox X/S) Uses 1 Free Windup 0.5 s Cooldown 45 s (Destroyed), 20 s (Used or Recalled) Health 20 HP Debuff 2.25 s Flash

x_ability.name: Ultimate Steel Garden
x_ability.description: Ultimate Steel Garden EQUIP a bramble of liquid metal. FIRE to send the metal erupting from you as a torrent of metal thorns, JAMMING enemy primary weapons after a brief windup.  X(PC) • L1+ R1(PS5) • Xbox LB button + Xbox RB button (Xbox X/S) ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ 8 points Windup 3.4 s Debuff 8 s Jammed
